description: This Dart source file defines the ListingScreen widget for a Flutter app, which displays a product listing page with filters, a grid of BookCards, and navigation to individual product pages.

classes.name: ListingScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of books with filtering options.

classes.name: _ListingScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the listing, filters, and UI interactions.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, setting the initialCategory from widget.

methods.name: _currentBooks
methods.description: Returns the list of books based on current filters.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for the selected book.

methods.name: _showFilterSheet
methods.description: Displays a modal bottom sheet with filter options for price and category.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the listing screen, including app bar, filters, and book grid.
